comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Goodgawdawmighty, what the hell has just crawled out of the Love Canal in that picture? Feather up the theme music from Jaws and get little Poopsie back in the stroller! We're outta' here. I remember the photographer from the Daily telling me she was interested in shooting "art pictures" for their special "Evolution: A Cosmic Trainwreck?" issue, but I honestly believed she was just dialing in her light meter until a _real_ curiosity came along. Never expected to see myself in roaring black and white on page three! Record number of cancelled subscriptions the next day, if I recall. Sheesh.
